attributes.title: Unrevealed Mysteries of Mystics (Siddha Tradition) - Nithyananda Morning Satsang 04 Dec 2010
attributes.description:
Living enlightened master and avatar Paramahamsa Nithyananda was very clear this morning, whoever reveals the unrevealed is an Incarnation. The unrevealed should not just disappear without being revealed to the world. Human consciousness should experience the Super Consciousness. This is done by Incarnations.
Yesterday he expressed some great truths about death. Today, he gave an example of how our bodies are like mirrors that forget to reflect back to the source, Sun, but instead project out to the world. Some things in the world are liked by the self, others rejected. This causes all our problems.  
The reflection, instead of looking at things it is reflecting onto (the ordinary life), should look back to the source. So many on the planet have life but don't know what to do with it -  too much choice without having choice-less awareness. If he is asked to kill any one state on planet, this is it: too much choice without choice-less awareness. 
We all have 72,000 minor nadis (energy channels) in body, 12 major ones, and one central, this is the Siddha science. Say you are attracted to food, one of your nadis will be engaged in this. If you are afraid of something, one nadi is used to keep that file. If you use too many nadis this way, you are caught in what you are seeing. If instead you  turn yourself to the source, from where you are reflecting, you have an enlightened life. 
Modern day kids suffer from this, which causes depression, drugs, and a loss of childhood and joy. Indian kids especially have lost their roots. He warned Indian Youth, getting back to the Vedic lifestyle is not an option, it is a medicine for them. This is the only remedy for Indian Youth. He doesn't mean drop their jeans, iPods and cellphones, but to put the culture back into their lives.  But living with too many choices without choiceless awareness is a dangerous idea. 
In the 72,000 nadis, if at least 10,000 are reflecting back to source, you will be balanced. So one hour daily be centered on higher ideals, the source from which you are reflecting. Or just perish. Indian youth are largest number in world. India has the largest young population. If they perish it is dangerous for the world. That is why he assumed the body of Indian youth, they are his first priority. 
This balance is the essence of life. Physically you will then express miracles. The reflection can change the mirror, your body, if more nadis are turned inward, instead of outward.
He is completely free on which he is reflecting. All 72,000 nadis reflect back to the source from which he is reflecting. He can make time out of consciousness. And he has enough to make not hundreds, but thousands of years. He will talk later about retrieving nadi flow to heal body, change body, heal body, and enjoy being in the body in next session.
Paramahamsa Nithyananda is a living enlightened master and a rare incarnation, an avatar who is the spiritual force for our millennium. He has inspired over 4 million lives worldwide to a new conscious age of enlightened living and has healed many thousands from chronic diseases and mental problems & traumas. The most watched and most popular spiritual teacher on Youtube globally with over 7000 hours of discourses, he has dedicated his life and the spiritual mission with over 1200 full-time volunteers to teach the science of enlightenment. 

His spiritual teachings, life solutions and meditation workshops are the extraordinary works of a Spiritual Genius. 'Inner Awakening' is his ultimate offering to create a New Man - a 21 days enlightenment intensive program for a permanent breakthrough in consciousness and to experience living enlightenment, a conflict-free life. Thousands from around the planet are experiencing their Inner Awakening with total physical wellbeing, deep emotional healing, release from past life traumas, DNA reprogramming and actualizing their limitless potential by transcending into a zone of bliss. Go to www.innerawakening.org or www.dhyanapeetam.org to begin your extraordinary way of existing this Dec2010!
